summary: Worker needs SSL/TLS configuration support for secure connections to Temporal service in production environments. Currently only the Client supports SSL configuration, creating a gap for production Worker deployments.
userImpact: Workers cannot be safely deployed in production environments without SSL/TLS support for connecting to the Temporal service.
proposedFix: Implement SSL configuration for Worker similar to the Node gRPC API pattern (grpc.credentials.createSsl)
resolutionDetails: SSL/TLS configuration support was added to the Worker connector
keyQuote: This feature is missing in order for the Worker to function in production environments. Currently only the Client supports this.
